summary: Frontend testing complete for 3 new landing pages (F1 Monaco Grand Prix, Tomorrowland 2025, Disneyland Paris). All features tested and working correctly: Landing pages load at correct URLs, SEO titles are properly set, urgency banners display correctly, prices are visible, and navigation from 'Hot Right Now' section on homepage works.
context_for_next_testing_agent: 3 new landing pages tested: /f1-monaco-grand-prix, /tomorrowland-2025, /disneyland-paris. All have correct SEO titles, urgency banners, pricing info, and Schema.org markup. 'Hot Right Now' section on homepage shows 4 landing page cards (Monaco GP, Tomorrowland, Disneyland Paris, World Cup 2026) with working navigation links.
